import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; const OrderDetails = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState("Hello World"); const [openDialog, setOpenDialog] = useState(false); const order = { id: "456as4", order_status: "In Progress", customer_name: "John", customer_surname: "Doe", customers: [ { customer_name: "Sheila" }, { customer_name: "Sheila" }, { customer_name: "Sheila" }, ], name: [ { choice: "Option 1" }, { choice: "Option 1" }, { choice: "Option 1" }, ], measurer: "Jane Doe", sewer: "Jane Doe", order_notes: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Illum omnis accusamus perferendis a veniam, sed culpa! Qui ea ducimus voluptates!", order_start_time: new Date(), in_progress_time: new Date(), in_progress_duration: { years: 5, months: 3, weeks: 3, days: 7, hours: 24, minutes: 60, seconds: 60, }, delivered_time: new Date("01/05/2024"), completed_time: new Date("02/05/2024"), delivered_time: new Date("03/05/2024"), order_end_time: new Date("04/05/2024"), completed_duration: { years: 26, months: 12, weeks: 52, days: 7, hours: 24, minutes: 60, seconds: 60, }, awaiting_duration: { years: 26, months: 12, weeks: 52, days: 7, hours: 24, minutes: 60, seconds: 60, }, delivered_duration: { years: 26, months: 12, weeks: 52, days: 7, hours: 24, minutes: 60, seconds: 60, }, order_duration: { years: 26, months: 12, weeks: 52, days: 7, hours: 24, minutes: 60, seconds: 60, }, }; const customer = { phone: "+263775324378", address: "74 Coronation", }; const user = { name: "James", surname: "Doe", }; const [users, setUsers] = useState([ { name: "James", surname: "Doe", }, { name: "James", surname: "Doe", }, { name: "James", surname: "Doe", }, ]); return ( <>

{order.id || "--"}

 Customer Details
  • {`${order.customer_name || "--"} ${ order.customer_surname || "--" }`}
    • {order.customers && order.customers.map((customer, index) => (
  • {customer.customer_name || "--"}
    • ))}
Email {customer.email || "--"} Order Details
    {order.name.map((order, index) => (
  • {order.choice}
    • ))}
Order Status

{order.order_status || "--"}

{customer.address || "--"}

{order.measurer || "--"}

 Cutter

{order.cutter || "--"}

{order.sewer || "--"}

 Other Details

{order.order_notes || "--"}

 Order Start Date

{order.order_start_time || "--"}

 {order.in_progress_time && ( In Progress:

{order.in_progress_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", }) || "--"}{" "} After {order.in_progress_duration.years} years,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.months} months,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.weeks} weeks,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.days} days,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.hours} hours,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.minutes} minutes,{" "} {order.in_progress_duration.seconds} seconds.

)} {order.delivered_time ? (

Order has been delivered.

) : (

Order is not yet in progress.

)} {order.completed_time && ( Complete:{" "}

{order.completed_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", }) || "--"} after {order.completed_duration.years}{" "} years, {order.completed_duration.months} months,{" "} {order.completed_duration.weeks} weeks,{" "} {order.completed_duration.days} days,{" "} {order.completed_duration.hours} hours,{" "} {order.completed_duration.minutes} minutes,{" "} {order.completed_duration.seconds} seconds.

)} {order.delivered_time && (

Order has been delivered.

)} {!order.delivered_time && !order.completed_time && (

Order is not yet complete.

)} {order.awaiting_time && ( Awaiting Delivery:{" "}

{order.awaiting_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", }) || "--"}{" "} after {order.awaiting_duration.years}{" "} years, {order.awaiting_duration.months} months,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.weeks} weeks,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.days} days,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.hours} hours,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.minutes} minutes,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.second} seconds.

)} {order.delivered_time && (

Order has been delivered.

)} {!order.awaiting_time && !order.delivered_time && (

Order is not yet ready for delivery.

)} {order.delivered_time && ( Delivered:{" "}

{order.delivered_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", }) || "--"} after {order.delivered_duration.years}{" "} years, {order.delivered_duration.months} months,{" "} {order.awaiting_duration.weeks} weeks,{" "} {order.delivered_duration.days} days,{" "} {order.delivered_duration.hours} hours,{" "} {order.delivered_duration.minutes} minutes,{" "} {order.delivered_duration.seconds} seconds.

)} {!order.delivered_time && (

Order has not been delivered.

)} Order End Date

{order.order_end_time || "--"}

 {order.order_end_time && ( Order Duration

{order.order_duration.years} years,{" "} {order.order_duration.months} months,{" "} {order.order_duration.weeks} weeks,{" "} {order.order_duration.days} days,{" "} {order.order_duration.hours} hours,{" "} {order.order_duration.minutes} minutes,{" "} {order.order_duration.seconds} seconds.

)} {!order.order_end_time && (

Order is still under {order.order_status}{" "} status. The duration will be calculated after delivery.

)}

); }; export default OrderDetails;
